title: vANanai mati shUDum
sahitya:
vANanai mati shUDum perumanai vEndanai tiruvaNNAmalaiyanai


anupallavi

  mAn tanai uDaiyanai yAnaiyin tOl tugil tarittAnai ambala


caraNam    aNanganai azhittanai malai magaL tanai kavarndAnai azhaganai
hAla viDam uNDa kaNThanai ingu anaittaiyum kaDandAnai anbarin
vEdanai tanai tIrppavanai pazha vinaigaLai kaLaindiDuvanai
enrum mudalvanai mukkaNNanai marai nAthanai naTarAjanai ninai
